Getting Started¶

Introduction¶

This section will give a quick outline of the design of ssbio and the scientific topics behind it.

The basics¶

ssbio was developed with simplicity in mind, and also as a direct extension of COBRApy. Furthermore, we didn’t want to reinvent the wheel wherever possible, and thus Biopython
